short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This wallet makes it easy to access your crypto and interact with blockchain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Libonomy wallet extension is a non-custodial, multi-chain wallet and DeFi gateway that is designed to connect users to the crypto world safely and securely using the convenience of your browser.

The Libonomy Wallet extension includes several advanced features that give users the best experience such as: Managing multi-chain wallets for a one-of-a-kind "always-connected" experience. Customers can store their cryptocurrency and use dapps with the Libonomy wallet extension. You can use this extension to access numerous dapps,  earn interest on your crypto, and trade tokens on DEXs.

Libonomy Wallet extension also guarantees compatibility with all kinds of dapps, so you never have to stress about switching to another wallet when using the most recent dapps. It is an original and most trusted wallet extension, with a slew of new features housed in an elegant and user-friendly interface.
